project.content:
CodeScalers



About

CodeScalersâ€™ mission is to develop promising technology for start-up companies in cloud computing and datacenters. Our customers are high tech startups that have found with CodeScalers a pool of talent that extends their R&D organisations. Our offices are in Dubai and Cairo.
project.excerpt: CodeScalers mission is to develop promising technology for start-up companies in cloud computing and datacenters.
